name: hotmart-client-search
description: Sistema de pesquisa de clientes Hotmart

scripts.db:search: node -e "const HotmartCSVProcessor = require('./csv-to-sqlite.js'); const processor = new HotmartCSVProcessor(); processor.search(process.argv[1] || 'test').then(console.log).catch(console.error)"
scripts.db:stats: node -e "const processor = require('./csv-to-sqlite.js'); processor.process().then(stats => console.log('ðŸ“Š', stats)).catch(console.error)"
scripts.setup: npm run db:process && npm run server

author: Diogo
